heronarts.lx.modulator
Class SquareLFO

java.lang.Object
  heronarts.lx.modulator.LXModulator
      heronarts.lx.modulator.SquareLFO

public class SquareLFO
extends LXModulator

Simple square wave LFO. Not damped. Oscillates between a low and high value.
